item.description:
We will be joining with another group to discus the importance of restoring our original organic Merkaba energy flows.

How these flows should be running (direction and speed), and why this information is VITAL to restore wellness on all levels requires an understanding of our multi-dimensional nature.

To facilitate understanding, attendees should first take the time to view 3 free on-line video presentations via this link:

http://www.krystalspi...

Total viewing time is approximately 6 hours. Since detailed diagrams are presented, it is recommended that this information be viewed a little at a time while taking notes of questions.

Most people find it helpful to view the entire presentation several times, since detailed information is explained.

A live presentation will be given at this Meetup, describing various types of Merkaba energy flows and Merkaba vehicles. Details of this copyrited information can be purchased at www.azuritepress.com.

Members are invited to visit that website frequently, since it contains a wealth of useful information, including

FREE ENERGY HEALING TECHNIQUES!


The presentation will be followed by a discussion period where members can ask questions.

To get the most out of this Meetup, don't forget to first take the time to view all 3 parts of the video presentation referenced above.

This free NH meetup is just 3 miles from exit 22 of I-93, approximately 30 minutes from Concord, Laconia, or Plymouth. After joining the group, you will be able to access the directions.

Since space is limited, it is important to RSVP early. The Meetup adjourns at 9:00 PM. Please bring your own refreshments.
item.how_to_find_us: Go up driveway with Meetup sign at the end, NOT the driveway with ULCS Clinic sign. Front entrance has another Meetup sign. Don't knock. Just go on downstairs and have a seat in the classroom.

group.name: Indigo Insights: Awakening to our Full Potential

item.name: Merkaba Mechanics and Self-Help Energy Techniques VITAL to complete by Dec. 2012
